main event: A white light appeared to be traveling much faster than a jet and faded out of sight after about 2 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared as a white light that was traveling at a very high speed.
The object just faded out of sight and was not seen continuously during the sighting.
The sighting occurred at around 3:55 AM local time.
The witness reported that the object was brighter than the brightest stars.
The witness was unable to estimate the speed or distance of the object.
